CustomField.description: Data Type Formula IF(Old_AUM_Value__c <Total_AUM__c , IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0152a0000004ya6", "Higher"), IF(Old_AUM_Value__c > Total_AUM__c, IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0152a0000004ya1", "Less "), IF(Old_AUM_Value__c = Total_AUM__c, IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0152a0000004yaB", "No Change"), IF(Old_AUM_Value__c = 0, IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0152a0000004yaB", "New"), "New"))))
CustomField.formula: IF(Old_AUM_Value__c <Total_AUM__c , IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EJNz", "Higher"), IF(Old_AUM_Value__c > Total_AUM__c, IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EJNy", "Less "), IF(Old_AUM_Value__c = Total_AUM__c, IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EJO0", "No Change"), IF(ISBLANK(Old_AUM_Value__c) , IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EJO0", "New"), "New"))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Arrow up = Total AUM had gone up between last upload and most recent upload. Arrow down = Total AUM has gone down between last upload and most recent upload. Equals = Total AUM has remained the same between last upload and most recent upload or is new
CustomField.label: AUM Change
